heading: HB03309
0: AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT IN THE PHILIPPINES, CREATING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER (BIRDC), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB03309
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTIONALIZING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY DEVELOPMENT IN THE PHILIPPINES, CREATING THE BAMBOO INDUSTRY RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT CENTER (BIRDC), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAR, CAMILLE A.
DATE FILED : 2019-08-01
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Jalosjos (000 2019-08-13)2. Nieto (000 2020-03-05)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee approved HBs 1274, 3309, 3373, 3469 and 4009 adopting HB 3469 as reference bill. The Secretariat was directed to prepare a substitute bill, subject to style, incorporating amendments proposed during the meeting.
      2. Transmitted to the Committee on Appropriations on 2019-12-09
      3. Transmmitted to the Committee on Ways and Means on 2019-12-09
      4. Scheduled for Deliberation by the Committee on Ways and Means on 2020-01-16
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-08-06
